body: When an oathbound paladin reach 4th level, she can spend two uses of her lay on hands ability to gain an extra use of smite evil that day. This ability has no effect for a paladin who does not have the smite evil ability. This ability replaces channel positive energy.
name: Channel Wrath
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Oathbound Paladin/Oaths/Oath of Vengeance/Channel Wrath
